subject: Tennis
Davis Cup
French Open (Tennis)
lead_paragraph: Gaël Monfils, Gilles Simon, Jo-Wilfried Tsonga and Richard Gasquet have yet to win a Grand Slam singles title or the Davis Cup, a sobering reality for the celebrated group of Frenchmen.
snippet: Gaël Monfils, Gilles Simon, Jo-Wilfried Tsonga and Richard Gasquet have yet to win a Grand Slam singles title or the Davis Cup, a sobering reality for the celebrated group of Frenchmen.
